meanings.definition: A type of Indian fried snack made with vegetables or meat.
meanings.sent1: I love to eat pakora with my friends during our picnics.
meanings.sent2: The pakora at the Indian restaurant was delicious and crispy.
meanings.sent3: My mom's pakora recipe is so good, it always disappears quickly at parties.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of freshly fried pakora filled the kitchen, making everyone hungry.
meanings.sent5: The golden pakora glistened enticingly under the warm lights of the buffet.

meanings.definition: To fry vegetables or meat in a batter.
meanings.sent1: I will pakora the vegetables for our dinner tonight.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys pakoraing different ingredients to create unique flavors.
meanings.sent3: When the chef accidentally pakoraed the dessert, it became a sweet surprise.
meanings.sent4: The sizzle of the oil as she pakoraed the chicken filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent5: He carefully pakoraed each piece of fish, ensuring they were perfectly crispy.
